quoteText:
<li>Online advertisers or third parties share information with us to measure, report on or improve the performance of ads on Pinterest, or to figure out what kinds of ads to show you on or off of Pinterest.
This includes information about your visits to an advertiser's site or purchases you made from them, or information about your interests from a third-party service, which we might use to help show you ads.
title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
